eu_initiatives:
ELI participates in the ESFRI Group, as part of the ESFRI Landmarks. 
Also, ELI DC participated in the consultation group during the preparation of the Charter for Access of Research Infrastructures. 
Furthermore ELI is member of the ERA Stakeholders Platform and the Association of European-level Research infrastructure Facilities (ERF-AISBL). 
ELI is member of the General Assembly of the RESAVER pension scheme, working towards the implementation of a new pan-European 2nd pillar pension system for researchers.
organisation_name: Extreme Light Infrastructure Delivery Consortium AISBL (ELI DC)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The main goal of ELI-DC is to complete ELI's de-centralized implementation while creating all conditions for the future operation of ELI as a single, distributed, international user facility of pan-European dimensions on laser, optics and photonics research.
relevant_communication: Through one of the ELI EU funded project, ELITRANS, ELI is developing different dissemination strategies and exploitation of results. The goal is to develop mechanism that lead to efficient research dissemination and exploitation of results (incl. enhancement of curricula)  and therefore sustainability of the key role of research in laser, optics and photonics in the European Research Area (ERA).
